pageContext.claim: “If a new HealthCare Bill is not approved quickly, BAILOUTS for Insurance Companies and BAILOUTS for Members of Congress will end very soon!”
pageContext.analysis: President Trump is misusing the term “bailout.” Insurance companies don’t make money through cost-sharing — they are being paid back for money they’ve already spent on behalf of people who purchased their health plans. Members of Congress also did not get "bailouts" when they were moved onto the Obamacare exchanges. The president either doesn’t understand the process or is being purposely misleading.
